com.im.njams.sdk.communication

Class SharedReceiverSupport<R extends AbstractReceiver & ShareableReceiver<M>,M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.SharedReceiverSupport<R,M>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The actual receiver implementation
    M - The message type being processed by the receiver

    public class SharedReceiverSupport<R extends AbstractReceiver & ShareableReceiver<M>,M>
extends Object
    A helper class that implements sharing receiver instances.
    Implementation notes: The actual implementations using this helper simply have to track adding and removing instances, and call onInstruction(Object, Instruction, boolean) for each received (and valid) instruction.
    Since:
    4.2.0
    Author:
    cwinkler

    • Method Detail

      • addNjams

        public void addNjams(Njams njamsInstance)
        Adds the given instance to this receiver for receiving instructions.
        Parameters:
        njamsInstance - The instance to add.
        See Also:
        JmsReceiver.setNjams(com.im.njams.sdk.Njams)

      • removeNjams

        public boolean removeNjams(Njams njamsInstance)
        Removes an instance from this receiver.
        Parameters:
        njamsInstance - The instance to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the actual receiver has been stopped, i.e., when there are no more instances registered with this shared receiver.

      • getAllNjamsInstances

        public Collection<Njams> getAllNjamsInstances()
        Returns all currently registered Njams instances.
        Returns:
        All currently registered Njams instances.

      • onInstruction

        public void onInstruction(M message,
                          com.faizsiegeln.njams.messageformat.v4.command.Instruction instruction,
                          boolean failOnMissingInstance)
        To be called for each received (and valid) instruction.
        Parameters:
        message - The original message received.
        instruction - The instruction parsed from the original message and to be completed with a reply.
        failOnMissingInstance - If true and error is sent as reply when no matching target Njams instance was found. Otherwise, the request is simply ignored.
